title.0: Observations Tending to Investigate the Nature of the Sun in Order to Find the Causes or Symptoms of Its Variable Emission of Light and Heat With Remarks on the Use That May Possibly Be Drawn from Solar Observations
title.1: Additional Observations Tending to Investigate the Symptoms of the Variable Emission of the Light and Heat of the Sun With Trials to Set Aside Darkening Glasses by Transmitting the Solar Rays through Liquids And a Few Remarks to Remove Objections That Might Be Made against Some of the Arguments Contained in the Former Paper
